member.name: T:JSONMorph.JsonMorph
member.summary: Provides helpers for generating and applying JSONMorph patches using the library's compact operation codes.
member.remarks: The supported operations are add (a), remove (rm), replace (rp), and text diff (td). Text diff operations target string values and encode start index, delete length, and replacement text instead of replacing the entire value. The API parses and emits JSON text using semantics so formatting is preserved only where possible. All JSON parsing and serialization uses invariant culture formatting to keep patches stable across environments.

member.name: M:JSONMorph.JsonMorph.ApplyPatch(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Applies a JSON patch document to a JSON payload and returns the transformed JSON.
member.param: The JSON document that will receive the patch.

The JSON patch to apply. The document must be an array of operations encoded with op, path, and optional value members. Text diff (td) operations expect an object payload with start, deleteLength, and insertText.
member.returns: The patched JSON document serialized with indented formatting.
member.exception: Thrown when the JSON payload or patch cannot be parsed.
Thrown when the patch contains unsupported or invalid operations.

member.name: M:JSONMorph.JsonMorph.GeneratePatch(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a JSON patch that transforms one JSON document into another. String differences are encoded using text diff operations.
member.param: The updated JSON document to compare against the baseline.
member.returns: A JSON patch array containing the minimal set of operations required to reach the modified document.
member.exception: Thrown when either JSON document cannot be parsed.
